review:
Игра хороша, но лучше не пробовать.
Сама игра, с точки зрения исполнения, просто отлична. Много экшена, есть вариативность в билдах и геймплее в целом. Даже затягивает, несмотря на её полумёртвое состояние. А посмотреть на него стоит, ибо... Неужели вам действительно хочется в это играть? Здесь невозможно прогрессировать, ни найти вам катку в рейтинге. Вы будете раз за разом играть с одними и теми же людьми, а играть ради коммьюнити - не лучшая цель. Поверьте. А играть в неё не стоит, ибо вам понравится. Да, понравится! Но никаких альтернатив у игры нет! Настолько она уникальна. Вот такой это капкан.

review: 0 баланса среди чемпионов, полная неадекватность большинства навыков, сапорты вкидываю больше урона чем те кто, должны наносить урон(1 кнопкой), есть турбированный скилл, нажми кнопку и С УВЕЛИЧЕННОЙ СКОРОСТЬЮ ЗАСТАВЬ УБЕГАТЬ ВРАГА, есть чемпион с бесконечно большим пулом хп, мобильностью как у гоночного болида, уроном, опять таки, тонна, при этом, имеет в своём арсенале кнопку на нанесение урона, в последствии увлечение следующего урона на 20%(напоминаю, хп тонна, мобильности столько же), дополним всё это кнопкой на иммун к любой атаке, теперь другие чемпионы, у некоторых есть кнопка, что позволяет ПОЛНОСТЬЮ ПАРИРОВАТЬ НАВЫКИ, ПРИ ЭТОМ НАНЕСЯ УРОН И ПРИ ЭТОМ ИМЕЯ ВОЗМОЖНОСТЬ ДВИГАТЬСЯ, А С ШЕДЕВРО ЛОГИКОЙ РАЗРАБА, ЕСЛИ ПРОИЗОШЛО ПАРИРОВАНИЕ, ТО БЫСТРЕЕ СБРАСЫВАЕТСЯ КД НАВЫКА. Я ещё не говорил про скилы наносящие тонну урона, при этом делая чемпиона неуязвимым и дая иммун к 99% навыков, про неадекватным хиллеров. Обобщу, если вы думаете скачать этот калл, то не советую, первые 30 мин против ботов будет самым лучшим экспириенсом, оставшееся время будет скучно, а комьюнити пикает самых лоботоми персов и играет, фана 0 скилла у таких игроков тоже 0. Советую удалить игру со всех платформ, чтобы не позориться таким баллансом. Хотя ко всем остальным аспектам игры вопросов нет, просто тот кто работал над балансом умрёт в муках.

review:
Я 40-летний отец, вероятно, один из старейших людей, играющих в эту игру.

Я отец-одиночка для моего сына, которому сейчас 10 лет. Мой сын недавно начал играть в Battlerite
Менее чем за неделю он уже наиграл более 8 часов.
Это было ужасно для меня, потому что мне уже было достаточно тяжело проводить время с сыном.
потому что он всегда был со своими друзьями или смотрел видео на YouTube.

Поэтому я решил создать аккаунт Steam, чтобы играть с сыном. Я начал играть, но это был мой первый раз, когда я играл в видеоигру с 90-х годов, поэтому я был довольно потерян. Я попросил сына о помощи, и мы вместе провели несколько часов, играя в эту игру.
Мне это понравилось, так как это было лучшее время, которое я провел со своим сыном с тех пор, как умерла моя жена. Игра в видеоигры напомнила мне, что во всем есть удовольствие, и это снова сблизило меня и моего сына, и теперь мы фактически проводим время вместе вне дома.

review: С друзьями играть весело, но только против друг друга. Система подбора матчей сомнительная, новичков (не в рейтинге) кидает к уже опытным игрокам, это руинит игровой опыт. Из первых 20 игр 18 с большой долей вероятности будут проиграны всухую, да и подбор долгий. Игра очень динамичная и требовательная к микро, вариантивная в плане билдов и способностей, когда осваиваешь чемпиона должным образом - играть становится приятно. Но до того момента пока не разберешься что тут и как, и как работают кнопки у героев - ты обречен на унижения. Пула новичков в игре нет, так что разница в скилле между командами в матче может быть просто ненормальная. В остальном - окей? Если не хотите тратить на страдания в пабликах слишком много времени - просто играйте версус друзей, это весело, и благо, игра бесплатная.

review:
So I returned to game few days back and here is my 2 cents:
First of all I thought the game was complete dead. WRONG. It's not super popular but it's def not dead UNLIKE(sadly) Battlerite Royal. I played game back in the days ¬100 hours and sadly or not but my experience was completely different, I will explain why:
1) People became much more toxic. I remember I used to play for fun on some characters I never play and got zero complain, now every game gets it. Not to say people sometimes say very very bad things to each other like in Dota 2 or LoL(-_-), it's actually so bad I had to use /disablechat feature which I never ever thought of using before lol.
2) Plus to (1), people started actively using emotions and not to be nice to each other but to use it as "spit" or "show off" showing their superior or some ♥♥♥♥. That's really disgusting.
3) Queue times - obv it's much slower than it used to be but it's reasonable not too bad.
4) Addition of Battlerite Royal maps + wind thing is actually cool.
5) Unlike Battlerite Royal there are no bots and every fight feels great and fun as many years ago.

So yeah, def recommend if u like quick matches it's still one of the best on the market.

It was a good game, but it's understandable that the devs let it go.

I see a lot of people saying it would have been an amazing game, but the reality is that the community kept dwindling (even before the royale split), which makes it understandable that they'd rather move on and make another game with a fresh new start.

For anyone who really enjoyed Battlerite, I would reccomend looking into "project loki", it seems heavily inspired by Battlerite, and feels similar-ish from what I've been able to play.

Otherwise, Vrising is pretty nice, and there are arena battle severs if you're looking for a similar experience.

Продукты (на 2 порции)
Тунец, консервированный в собственном соку - 1 банка
Помидоры черри - 5-6 шт.
Яйцо куриное - 2 шт.
Лук белый - 1 шт.
Огурец большой - 1 шт.
Масло оливковое - 2 ст. ложки
Салат листовой - 100 г
Петрушка - пару веточек
Соль - по вкусу
Перец черный молотый - по вкусу

Для приготовления овощного салата с тунцом подготовьте все необходимые продукты. Овощи помойте, обсушите, слейте воду с тунца. Яйца отварите 8 минут, сразу остудите в холодной воде.

Чистые салатные листья выложите в удобную посуду, заправьте оливковым маслом, солью и перцем, перемешайте.

Выложите салатные листья на блюдо для подачи.

В центр выложите кусочки консервированного тунца в собственном соку.

Нарежьте помидоры черри, выложите их на салат.

Следующим нарежьте огурец, добавьте в салат.


Аккуратно разрежьте яйцо на четыре части, выложите на салат, сбрызните его немного оливковым маслом, посолите и поперчите. Украсьте листиками петрушки.

Посыпьте верх салата кружочками сладкого белого лука.

Подавайте вкуснейший, легкий и полезный овощной салат с тунцом сразу же после приготовления.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093108826', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 5053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5053, 'last_played': 1703519974}
review:
[h1]Overview[/h1] 
[list] 
[*]"MOBA" with no laning phase, towers/base or monster camps. 
[*]No items, XP, or farming. Dive straight into teamfights. 
[*]Build loadouts with champion-specific cards.
[*]28 champions, each with 9 abilities.
[*]Quick games. Round-based best-of-5 format. 
[*]Slow queues. Wait time varies between instant to 30mins. 
[/list] 
  
[h1]Art & Graphics ★★★★☆[/h1] 
[list] 
[*]League of Legends art style, familiar and feels right at home for MOBA players. 
[*]Graphics quality is much better than LoL, effects are flashier and appear bigger because of camera zoom level and angle. 
[*]Overall a hefty visual upgrade from the scores of LoL-clones out there. 
[/list] 
  
[h1]Music & Sounds ★★★☆☆[/h1] 
[list] 
[*]Immersive soundtrack. Tribal chants, haunting howls, choral high notes, instruments that sound exotic. Not your generic music bought from an asset store. 

[*]Skins don’t contain new audio—not even legendary skins!—which is a pity because some of them require their own voice lines to sell the concepts (*cough* Succubus Blossom *cough*). 
[/list] 
  
[h1]Plot & Characters ★★★★☆[/h1] 
[list] 
[*]Characters are unique, voices are fitting, distinct silhouettes. 
[*]Voice acting department has no particularly outstanding performance. Swag and style are there, but emotions subdued. 

[*]There's a lore hub at the official site with interesting short stories. For a MOBA, it’s a pretty good effort at world building and fleshing out champion bios. 
[/list] 
  
[h1]Controls & Interface ★★☆☆☆[/h1] 
[list] 
[*]UI is minimalistic, but not plain. Color palettes are pastel-y, but don't feel childish. Overall a bright and clean look. 

[*]Some UI quirks — Unable to see friends list if you have a full party unless at the main menu (takes many clicks). No way to see a champion’s Max HP except going in game. There’s more. 

[*]Unable to set mouse sensitivity. Uses system's setting which isn't ideal. If you have a gaming mouse, you might want to put the DPI-switch button to good use. 

[*]A mini-map is sorely needed in game, and gameplay suffers because of it.
[/list] 
  
[h1]Gameplay ★★☆☆☆[/h1] 
[list] 
[*]As someone who agrees with Valve that the MOBA genre should be called Action RTS, Battlerite is a Multiplayer Online Battle Arena in the purest literal meaning of the term. It strips away the RTS and RPG influences that slow things down and leans towards the Arena Shooter genre's formula of health/power-up pick-ups, small maps, and constant high tempo. 

[*]What this game really is—what the term MOBA should really mean—is an Arena Brawler. It adopts the Battle Royale genre's shrinking safe zone (which is a great fit for an Arena Brawler) in order to keep the game pacing fast and exciting. 

[*]When all that’s left of the existing definition of MOBA is teamfights, you got to add meaningful depth to the fighting. Battlerite aspired to be a competitive esports, and in doing so, its design set a high skill floor and an even higher skill ceiling. 

[*]Doing basic actions require some level of finesse. There is no hitscan in this game. ADCs need to aim their projectile shots. Majority of spells have a long cast time. But rewarding if hit. CCs are long, typically around 3secs (everyone is a Morgana). Getting chain-CCed means a helluva good time being afk. Walking speed is slow. Even slower while attacking. And many spells require standing still to cast. Auto-attacks cannot be canceled to cast a spell, meaning holding MB1 is a no-no — Not only does it slow down your walking speed, it also makes you miss your spell activations and become slower to respond.

[*]Due to the lack of anti-CC runes, champions rely on dashes, jumps and "Counter" (a parry mechanic that can stun melee attackers and reflect projectiles). This is of course, kit-reliant and lends itself to balancing issues.

[*]3 out of 9 CCs in the game (Petrify, Panic and Incapacitate) can be dispelled if the victim takes damage from an enemy. This design helps low elo where bad teamwork is rampant, while preserving the value of CC in high elo. It is a great idea, but sadly do not apply to other CCs such as stun and blind. 

[*]It's terribly frustrating that displacement attacks can forcefully shift your aim and cause you to miss. This is in part thanks to the slow cast time of spells. There are *a lot* of displacement attacks in this game that don’t even apply hard CC.

[*]The walls are terrible. They block spells that visually look like they can be lobbed over and the cast indicator shows green. They also block vision. Once you turn a corner, you won't be able to see you ally anymore, not even an outline of them. This LOS fog of war is too punishing for solo queue players, which exacerbates the unfair advantage of premades with voice comms. 

[*]Damage taken will permanently reduce Max HP if left unhealed for a while. This is Battlerite’s anti-heal system to combat healer meta. It’s not only confusing (and unexplained) to new players, it also greatly reduces the chance of a losing team making a comeback after regrouping. 

[*]There are some horribly-broken champions. Most cooldowns are long, but some champions get to spam their abilities or are able to cycle through their kit in a way such that they are a threat 100% of the time. Some melees have insane gap closers and CC-chain combos while others get kited easily. Balance is in a pitiful state in this game.

[/list] 
  
[h1]Verdict [/h1] 
[quote]Battlerite is an ambitious game that tries too hard to spice up what little material it has left as a MOBA-lite.

The game has only 1 game loop — destroy your enemies and occasionally the orb at the center of the map for some buffs. This gets sickening really quickly. 

Its design which utilizes delay/slowness to reward prediction creates a high skill floor unwelcoming for new/casual players. You don't just fight enemies, but also the fighting system itself. It takes one who has mastered "the art of fighting underwater" to wholly find enjoyment in playing such a sluggish game. 

Now that there's the Arena game mode in League of Legends, this game has lost its selling point in the MOBA space, which for quite some time made it a unique choice.[/quote] 
  
[b][/b]

[quote]
[h2] "Battlerite" - A Fast-Paced Arena Brawler That Hits the Mark. [/h2]
[/quote]

[quote]
"Battlerite" has carved a niche for itself in the competitive gaming landscape, offering a stripped-down and exhilarating arena brawler experience. The game's focus on intense, skill-based battles and short match durations caters to those seeking quick bursts of adrenaline.

The roster of champions, each with unique abilities, adds depth to the gameplay, allowing for diverse strategies and team compositions. The well-designed arenas create a dynamic battleground where every move and decision can turn the tide of battle.

The game's emphasis on skillful play and teamwork has resonated with many players, fostering a dedicated and competitive community. The streamlined nature of the matches ensures that players can dive into the action without the need for lengthy time commitments.

However, "Battlerite" also faces some challenges. The player base, while passionate, may not be as extensive as some other titles in the genre. Matchmaking issues can occasionally lead to uneven skill matchups, affecting the overall experience for both newcomers and seasoned players.

In summary, "Battlerite" delivers an engaging and fast-paced arena brawler experience that aligns with the preferences of many players. While it may not boast the largest player base, those who appreciate skill-based combat and teamwork will find a satisfying home in the heart of its intense arenas.
[/quote]

review:
Я 54-летний отец, вероятно, один из старейших людей, играющих в эту игру.
Я отец-одиночка для моего сына, которому сейчас 14 лет. Мой сын недавно начал играть в игру
Менее чем за неделю он уже наиграл более 20 часов.
Это было ужасно для меня, потому что мне уже было достаточно тяжело проводить время с сыном.
потому что он всегда был со своими друзьями или смотрел видео на YouTube.
Поэтому я решил создать аккаунт Steam, чтобы играть с сыном. Я начал играть, но это был мой первый раз, когда я играл в видеоигру с 90-х годов, поэтому я был довольно потерян. Я попросил сына о помощи, и мы вместе провели несколько часов, играя в эту игру.
Мне это понравилось, так как это было лучшее время, которое я провел со своим сыном с тех пор, как умерла моя жена. Игра в видеоигры напомнила мне, что во всем есть удовольствие, и это снова сблизило меня и моего сына, и теперь мы фактически проводим время вместе вне дома.

Esses dias estava desanimado, com tédio, procurando algo para jogar. Nada me satisfazia, nenhum jogo era legal o bastante. Navegando pela minha biblioteca de jogos, me deparo com um nome familiar: Battlerite. No momento, parte de uma chama acendeu em mim e me lembrei de 2017, quando o jogo estava em desenvolvimento e diversos canais na Twitch faziam campeonatos para divulgação. Assistindo aqueles pequenos campeonatos, me apaixonei quase que instantaneamente pelo jogo e o seu estilo de gameplay. Comprei e passei algumas poucas horas jogando, mas sempre assistia streamers batalhando na arena. 

Eu abri o jogo com o coração palpitando e uma onda de nostalgia tomou conta de mim. 6 anos atrás, eu estava na mesma arena, escolhendo o meu campeão e saindo na porrada com minha equipe. Mesmo com a fila fantasma tomando conta do lobby, um pingo de felicidade surgiu no fundo do meu coração. Foram bons tempos.

Agora tudo que resta são os heróis esquecidos, esperando pacientemente um novo jogador para escolhê-los para poderem sentir o calor da batalha novamente.

review:
*This review is for merely historical purposes as the game, while playable, is functionally abandoned*

The purest MOBA by definition:
Battlerite is Multiplayer, it's Online, and you do Battle in different Arenas. A truly no nonsense game with no other objective than duking it out against the oposing team in 2v2 and 3v3 battles in a Bo5 format that'll take no more than 15 minutes (at most).
Easy to pick up, meaning you can have a blast with just basic knowledge while deeper mechanics ensure sweaty hardcores will still have plenty to sink their teeth in. A small yet diverse cast of Champions ensures you'll find one to go with your playstyle, and that EVERYONE is a viable choice, in the right hands. And the namesake Battlerites offer a way to further hone your preffered playstyle or allow you to adapt to your oponents. 
With a moment to moment gameplay akin to a constant teamfight, Battlerite is one of the best MOBAs out there, definitely worth your time.

---------
With that out of the way:
All in all Battlerite had the potential to be the next big thing, but Stunlock continued pursuit of whatever the current trend is hampered it's growth. The release of Battlerite:Royale as a stand alone game (where it should've been a game mode) divided the player base, which they later abandoned in favor of V:Rising. There's barely any people playing, most of which are raging over casual matches on a dead game. For what I've seen Stunlock has pulled the plug on most regional servers, and even if your region does have a server if it's not EU or US good luck getting decent ping, making a game all about reaction time and precise motion unplayable. 
But hey, it was nice while it lasted, and again, if you're in the US or in EU it's definitely worth playing.

review:
Dear Battlerite,

My Love, my Light, my PVP soulmate.
May you forever live within the hearts, minds, and the very souls of the beloved players who adored you so. Though your life and gaming relevancy were so short lived, I'd like to think I'm not the only gamer who's gaming life was changed by you. 
Years ago, Battlerite taught me to love competitive PVP, and that dedicating time to improve pays off. It was the first Steam game I ever broke 100 hours in, and at the time, it was my most played Steam game by far. I had many ups and downs, wins and losses, but as long as I kept playing, I kept improving. 

Battlerite, you made me a better gamer in every way, and I miss you so. Should you ever make a comeback, I'll be right there waiting. Rest now, and rest well. May it strengthen you for the next life, wherein we shall meet again.

With love and loyalty,

A Dedicated Player

review:
One of the best alternative to popular MOBAs that I ever played. Games are shorts, intense and mostly fun!

If you don't have so much time to spend for each game and you don't enjoy the farming of most MOBas then this game is for you. Unfortunately Battlerite failed to keep its player base and they chose to develop more on the battle royale aspect to attract some players.

I would still give it a go since it’s a free to play, but don’t expect to have a very active player base!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007922787', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 18013, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18013, 'last_played': 1675692680}
review: Лучший Баттлрояль, который когда либо выходил. К сожалению нормисы не выкупили, а разработчики слишком тормозные, поэтому на данный момент проект сдох. Это ответвление от оригинальной Battlerite арены, которая пофиксила, как мне кажется, главные проблемы. Battlerite был слишком вылизанным, с очень хорошим балансом для компетитива, по началу с этого дико кайфуешь, но быстро становится скучно. В Рояле же многое зависит от твоего старта и найденного лута, но при этом осталась коровая механика арены, поэтому скилл стоит во главе угла. Помимо чистого микроконтроля героя, в дело вступают макро-решения по карте и толика тактики. Самое классное, что в Рояль можно добавлять кучу контента не так переживая о балансе как в Арене, но Станлоки вместо действительно интересных решений перевыпускали чемпионов из оригинала. В итоге хороший онлайн быстро сошел на нет, а оригинальный Баттлрайт тоже сдох, потому что все силы были направлены на Рояль. Непонятно почему игра платно распространялась в раннем доступе, в эпоху бесплатных онлайн игр, и непонятно зачем кормить людей тем же самым контентом. В видео-обзоре я затронул геймплей, здесь же решил поделиться мыслями и объяснить причины провала проекта.

author: {'steamid': '76561199164943019', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1700233989}
review:
The game itself is interesting and I like the concept of playing MOBA team-fights without the hassle of it (farming and stuff, although those can be fun too).

However, currently it's considered dead, and while I usually don't care that much about games being dead, this one is different. Queue times weren't that high for me, less than three minutes. But Every game hat I've played (three or four, and it is not much I know), somebody on the other team was picking that one melee character that just spams stuns.

The player base is small right now, and either there are no noobs like me to play with, or they just pick the cheesiest characters and it's not enjoyable. I can pick that character or grind the game until I can counter him, but honestly I don't feel like it. It's a shame that the game died, and I wasn't there to play it at its peak. 

So if you are new to MOBAs, and/or consider yourself a noob, at least the first few matches won't be that much fun. I don't know about the rest. But it's free, the mechanics are solid, give it a try and see for yourself.

review:
Battlerite, folks, it's a game that's got its pros and cons, let me tell you.

Gameplay:
The gameplay in Battlerite is intense, it's fast-paced, 2v2 and 3v3 battles that require skill, teamwork, and quick reflexes. The champions, they've got their own abilities and playstyles, it's a diverse roster. But I've got to be honest, it's got a steep learning curve and a high skill ceiling. The rounds are short and exciting, but some might want longer matches.

Graphics and Sound:
The visuals, they're decent, with detailed characters and well-designed arenas. Not the most impressive graphics, but they do the job. The sound, it's okay, complements the action, but it doesn't particularly stand out.

Progression System:
The progression system, it's straightforward. You play to unlock champions and cosmetics. It's free-to-play, which is fair, but grinding for cosmetics might take some time. And let's talk about monetization, loot boxes, not everyone's cup of tea.

Community and eSports:
Battlerite has a dedicated community, but it's not as big as some other games. So, you might have to wait longer in queues. But they've got eSports support, which keeps competitive players engaged.

In summary, Battlerite offers a unique and skill-based gaming experience. It's intense, but it can be a bit of a challenge. The graphics and sound, they're okay, not groundbreaking. Progression, well, it takes dedication. If you're into arena brawlers and can handle the learning curve, give Battlerite a shot. You'll get some intense gameplay and a mix of pros and cons, that's for sure.

review:
This is the gold standard for Battle Arena games:
Easy to pick up and understand, but with a good amount of depth and skill expression. There are short queue times, loading times, matches, and good servers (from my experience). 
No objectives other than to FIGHT which is the best part of any MOBA. 
Hell even the cosmetics are incredible ( I just found out about the pig and snail pets, incredible game design)
For a game that hasnt been updated in years I have not found any unbalanced matches so far,
even one-sided matches can be enjoyed or at the very least finished quickly (5 minutes of losing feels like nothing compared to the drawn out games of DOTA, League and the rest)

Wishlist: 
1. Daily missions should either give more rewards or replenish all missions each day instead of only one 150 gold mission, as these are the main way I've found to gain the currency it would make unlocking and trying new champions more convenient. 
2. A rematch option at the end of each game for any players that want it, I understand that private lobbies exist but it removes the hassle of adding each person from the public match as a friend then setting up a lobby. 

This is a hell of a game, I hope it gets the revival it deserves

review: Soy un padre de 50 años, probablemente una de las personas más viejas que juegan este juego. Soy padre soltero de mi hijo, que ahora tiene 14 años. Mi hijo recientemente descargó Northgard y en menos de una semana, ya había jugado durante más de 20 horas. Esto fue terrible para mí, ya que ya era bastante difícil para mí pasar tiempo con mi hijo, ya que él siempre sale con sus amigos o simplemente mira videos en Tiktok. Así que decidí crear una cuenta de Steam y comprar este juego para ver si podía jugar junto a él. Cargué el juego, hice el tutorial pero estaba atascado en lo que se suponía que debías hacer. Le pedí ayuda a mi hijo y organizó un juego para que yo me uniera. Me encantó porque era el mejor momento que había pasado con mi hijo desde que mi esposa había muerto. Desde entonces, este juego ha acercado a mi hijo y a mí nuevamente y ahora también pasamos tiempo juntos fuera de la casa. Este juego me recordó que hay diversión en todo, y nos ha traído tanto a mí como a mi hijo muchos recuerdos felices.

review:
Battlerite is an intense arena brawler that offers fast-paced, skill-based combat. The game pits players in 2v2 or 3v3 battles where teamwork and precise control of champions are crucial.

With a top-down perspective, Battlerite focuses on eliminating the fluff often seen in other MOBAs and provides players with pure, action-packed combat. Matches are short but thrilling, emphasizing quick reflexes and strategic decision-making.

Champion variety and balance are standout features, ensuring that no single character dominates the game. While the visuals are not groundbreaking, they serve the game's purpose well.

Battlerite's free-to-play model lets players access champions and cosmetics without paying, but there is an option to purchase a Battle Pass and in-game currency. This system keeps the playing field level and allows players to earn in-game rewards.

In conclusion, Battlerite is a fantastic choice for those seeking intense, skill-based arena combat without the complexities of a traditional MOBA. It's easy to pick up, challenging to master, and provides a thrilling gaming experience.

[h1]Battlerite: Um jogo de combate em arena com um sistema de habilidades estilo MOBA[/h1]

[b][u]Battlerite[/u][/b] é um jogo de combate em arena com um sistema de habilidades estilo MOBA, que coloca dois times de dois ou três jogadores para se enfrentarem em partidas rápidas e intensas. O jogo é desenvolvido pela [Stunlock Studios] e publicado pela [Stunlock Studios] e [Coffee Stain Publishing]. Ele foi lançado em 2017 para PC, e recentemente se tornou gratuito para jogar. O jogo conta com atualizações regulares de conteúdo e eventos especiais.

[h2]Sobre o jogo[/h2]

O jogo tem um sistema de personagens chamados Campeões, cada um com suas próprias habilidades e personalidades. Você pode escolher entre 28 Campeões diferentes, divididos em três categorias: Corpo a Corpo, À Distância e Suporte. Cada Campeão tem uma habilidade passiva, cinco habilidades básicas, duas habilidades EX e uma habilidade suprema, que podem ser usadas para criar estratégias e sinergias com os seus companheiros de equipe. Você pode personalizar o seu Campeão com diferentes visuais, cores e poses.

O jogo tem um sistema de combate dinâmico e fluido, onde você pode usar diferentes tipos de habilidades, como projéteis, golpes, escudos, curas e armadilhas, cada uma com suas próprias características e tempo de recarga. Você também pode usar itens consumíveis, como orbes de vida e energia, para se curar ou potencializar as suas habilidades. Você deve evitar ou cancelar os ataques inimigos, usando esquivas, contra-ataques ou imunidades. Você deve derrotar todos os jogadores do time adversário para marcar um ponto, e o primeiro time a fazer três pontos vence a partida.

[h2]Prós[/h2]

[list] [*]Campeões carismáticos e diversificados [*]Habilidades balanceadas e customizáveis [*]Combate rápido e empolgante [*]Gráficos bonitos e coloridos [*]Gratuito para jogar e justo [/list]

[h2]Contras[/h2]

[list] [*]Poucos modos de jogo [*]Comunidade tóxica [*]Servidores instáveis e lag [*]Falta de tutorial e ajuda [*]Sem história ou objetivo [/list]

[h2]Nota: 8/10[/h2]

Población Disminuida: Uno de los problemas más notables de Battlerite ha sido la disminución de la población de jugadores a lo largo del tiempo. Esto ha llevado a tiempos de espera prolongados para encontrar partidas, especialmente en regiones menos pobladas, lo que puede resultar en una experiencia frustrante para los jugadores.

Curva de Aprendizaje Pronunciada: Battlerite es conocido por su alta dificultad y curva de aprendizaje pronunciada. Los nuevos jugadores a menudo se sienten abrumados por la rapidez de los combates y la necesidad de aprender las mecánicas avanzadas del juego. Esto puede desalentar a los recién llegados y dificultar su progreso.

Repetitividad: Aunque los combates en Battlerite son intensos y emocionantes, algunos jugadores han señalado que el juego puede volverse repetitivo con el tiempo. La falta de variedad en los modos de juego y mapas puede contribuir a esta sensación.

Dificultad para Jugar en Solitario: Battlerite se enfoca en partidas de equipos, lo que puede dificultar que los jugadores que prefieren jugar en solitario encuentren una experiencia satisfactoria. La falta de un modo de juego en solitario sólido puede ser un problema para algunos.

Modelo de Negocio de Microtransacciones: Aunque Battlerite es un juego gratuito para jugar, ha sido criticado por su modelo de negocio basado en microtransacciones. Algunos jugadores consideran que la adquisición de nuevos campeones y cosméticos puede ser costosa y que esto puede afectar negativamente la experiencia.

Falta de Desarrollo Continuo: La comunidad ha expresado preocupación por la falta de desarrollo continuo y actualizaciones significativas para el juego. Esto ha llevado a preguntas sobre el futuro a largo plazo de Battlerite.

review:
I paid $100+ for Bloodline Champions when it came out (the most I ever spent on a video game ever) only to find out that the severs were not populated. I don't regret my purchase as this is a fantastic follow-up and the studio is sure to be successful. 

However, I wish that this game did not pair you up with another asymmetric team. Rather, it would be miles better to do mirror match-ups by forcing each team to play with the same champions. For example, you could do a character choosing and voting screen before the match to choose the preferred mirror matches. This change would make the same much much more competitive and would make you feel like you earned the victory more. It would also remove some mismatches where asymmetric pairing have one clear (better) winning combo over the other. 

I will be playing the fuck out of V Rising... what a great follow up yet again... this studio is awesome. 

I hope they make a Battlerite 2 (or something like it again) with the system I mentioned above.

review:
Jogo extremamente divertido.
É competitivo mas não demais, e não tem uma curva de aprendizado longa ou grande.
Nunca encontrei bugs ou lags.
Seu balanceamento é ok.

Seu único problema é a falta de jogadores ativos. Dá pra jogar tranquilo, só tem que ter um pouco de paciência pela manhã  e  madrugada. Também por causa da falta de jogadores, os modos Liga (Ranked) e Duelo (1x1) demoram demais demais demais para encontrar uma partida; isso quando encontram...

Mesmo assim, eu ainda recomendo muitíssimo esse jogo. É divertido, casual e competitivo (mais casual) numa medida gostosinha, balanceado e bom demais para sair da mesmice e se descontrair.

Só fico triste por não ter pego seu pico para poder jogar a Liga :( ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198005432069', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 53494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53383, 'last_played': 1697353553}
review:
The sad tale of an amazing game hampered by truly awful management decisions. 

The perplexing monetization strategy of this arena battler doomed the production from the start. Instead of monetizing progression in a sustainable fashion like LoL or DoTa2, the devs inexplicably offered a deal whereupon the player would get access to every champion on the roster in addition to EVERY future champion for the price of around $30, resulting in a massive upfront cash infusion followed by a permanent monetary drought shortly thereafter. 

Then, in a truly bizarre turn of events, the devs would decide to abandon their vision for the game in order to chase temporary trends by switching most of their small dev team to a companion game involving Fortnight-like gameplay, simultaneously ceasing production on the original game while sinking resources into a client that no one wanted or asked for. To make matters worse, what amounted to a new game mode was touted as its own stand-alone title on a separate client, splitting the already fragile player base and disillusioning the vast majority of players who were left to twist in the wind and slowly dwindle away as they realized the game they loved would no longer receive any new content. 

To top it all off, instead of course correcting, the devs decided to abandon the game entirely, exactly like they did their first title, and were prepared to go so far as to shut down all their servers until the remaining player base shamed them into keeping the game up and running. 

This game had all the potential in the world to became a massive hit if the management were not such bungling fools on a truly epic scale. 

Now it is relegated to the dustbin of history as the devs move on to their next project which is inevitably doomed to fail because you just can't fix stupid.

Truly Battlerite is the definition of snatching defeat from the jaws of victory.

- il n'y a pas de notion de "feed" car pas d'objet à acheter in game (pas de 1-shot par un perso en 20-0)

Le système de deck similaire à celui de Paladins est une autre manière de modifier un peu le gameplay d'un perso pour s'adapter à sa compo et la compo adverse.

Par contre:
- Le jeu est abandonné par les devs
- Les temps de queue sont assez longs
Mais bon le deuxième point est compensé si vous arriver à rassembler assez de gens pour faire des customs :)
